channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Prince Harry, Richard Branson, Steve Bannon, and ‘AI godfathers’ call on AI labs to halt their pursuit of ‘superintelligence’—warning the technology could surpass human control
item.description: An open letter backed by AI pioneers, policymakers, and public figures urges tech companies to pause the race toward superintelligent AI, warning that...

item.title: Beyond Meat’s 250% stock pop was spurred by a Dubai-based real estate developer. Now the company is squarely in meme-stock territory
item.description: The rally came after years of Beyond losing steam.

item.title: Crypto lost 1,000 jobs to AI since ChatGPT launched—but gained them back from other sectors, says a16z report
item.description: The top Silicon Valley venture firm also highlighted crypto users’ interest in privacy in its annual state of crypto briefing.

item.title: As national debt accelerates to $38 trillion, watchdog warns it’s ‘no way for a great nation like America to run its finances’
item.description: In just a little over two months, the national debt swelled by $1 trillion. This is twice as fast as the rate of growth since 2000, Michael Peterson s...

item.title: Tesla reports record sales, record storage—but profit slips as tax-credit rush pulls demand forward
item.description: Tesla posted all-time highs in vehicle deliveries and energy storage deployments in Q3, lifting revenue, but compressed automotive margins and a pull-...

item.title: Focus on Tesla's revenue beat and not the earnings miss, this analyst says
Tesla earnings are out, and the stock is dipping. Here's what to know.
